description: Static semantic labels for ego graph metrics. Maps numerical ranges to human-readable phrases for UI display.

readability.conceptual_meaning: Measures how well a neighbor can understand and model the focal person's semantic interests based on ridge regression R². Higher values indicate the neighbor understands what the focal person is about.

labels.label: opaque
labels.description: Unable to reconstruct interests; semantic fields are orthogonal or misaligned

labels.label: barely legible
labels.description: Minimal understanding; can capture only surface-level aspects of interests

labels.label: somewhat understood
labels.description: Moderate reconstruction capability; grasps general themes but misses nuances

labels.label: well understood
labels.description: Strong reconstruction; neighbor's semantic position effectively models interests

labels.label: highly transparent
labels.description: Exceptional understanding; neighbor's field nearly perfectly predicts interests

overlap.conceptual_meaning: Jaccard index measuring shared neighbors between the focal person and a connection. High overlap means redundant networks (know same people), while low overlap means access to distinct social circles (structural holes).

labels.label: distinct circles
labels.description: Almost no shared contacts. Strong structural hole - this connection provides access to an entirely separate network

labels.label: minimal overlap
labels.description: Very few mutual connections. Weak bridge offering diverse perspectives and novel information flow

labels.label: moderate overlap
labels.description: Some shared acquaintances. Partial bridge between networks with both familiar and novel contacts

labels.label: high overlap
labels.description: Many mutual connections. Strong embeddedness within the same social cluster - redundant but reinforcing

labels.label: heavy overlap
labels.description: Most contacts are shared. Highly embedded in same tight-knit group with limited novelty potential

labels.label: nearly identical networks
labels.description: Almost complete neighbor overlap. Redundant connection providing minimal new network access

orientation_score.conceptual_meaning: Composite metric for strategic network navigation. Combines network exploration (low overlap), mutual understanding (legibility and attunement), semantic relevance (topical match), and reliability (stability). Higher scores indicate better candidates for next interaction.

labels.label: poor fit
labels.description: Low strategic value. Either semantically misaligned, poorly understood, or part of an unfamiliar cluster. Consider only if exploring entirely new territory

labels.label: limited potential
labels.description: Below-average strategic value. May have network overlap or modest semantic alignment, but lacks strong mutual understanding or topical relevance

labels.label: moderate potential
labels.description: Solid strategic value. Balanced combination of network novelty, mutual legibility, and semantic relevance. A reasonable choice for next interaction

labels.label: high potential
labels.description: Strong strategic value. Excellent balance of exploration (non-overlapping network), understanding (good attunement), and topical alignment. Prioritize for next interaction

labels.label: exceptional fit
labels.description: Outstanding strategic value. Near-optimal across all dimensions: opens new network territory, strong mutual understanding, highly relevant to current focus. Top priority for engagement

labels.label: ideal target
labels.description: Maximum strategic value. Perfect storm of network novelty, mutual legibility, cluster attunement, and semantic alignment. Extremely rare—pursue immediately if stable
